snippet: Senators of both parties criticized Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. for the secrecy surrounding legal memorandums justifying drone strikes aimed at American citizens.
abstract: Senate Judiciary Committee members from both parties criticize Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr for secrecy surrounding Justice Dept legal memorandums justifying drone strikes aimed at American citizens; push him to say more about when Obama administration believes it can use military force on United States soil.
lead_paragraph: Senators of both parties criticized Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. for the secrecy surrounding legal memorandums justifying drone strikes aimed at American citizens.

headline.seo: Senators Press Holder on Use of Military Force on U.S. Soil
headline.main: Senators Press Holder on Use of Military Force
headline.print_headline: Senators Press Holder On Use of Military Force
